description: Expect basslines so deep they'll rearrange your chakras. And your furniture.
We're legally obligated to warn you: our trombonist has been known to cause spontaneous polyester combustion.
The only festival where the mud is 10% rain and 90% pure, unadulterated funk.
No tickets, just vibes. Get down early before the fire marshal starts asking questions about the rhythm section.
A secret show so groovy, we can't even tell you where it is. But if you know, you know.
